text: muhammadeuneun hananim-ui seonjijaisimyeo geuwa hamkke haneun jadeul-eun bulsinjadeul-e daehayeo ma-eum-i ganghago geudeul saieneun injeong-i manhdeola geu deul-eun heolileul gubuligo yebaehamyeo hananim-ui eunhyewa gippeum-eul giwonhaneun geudeul-eul geudaega bolila geudeul-ui eol gul-eneun buboghan heunjeog-i issdoda geugeos-eun guyag-e myosahan geosgwa sin-yag-ebiyudoeeo issnani ssias-i dod-ana ip-eul piugo teunteunhayeo jimyeo julgi lo jalana ssias-eul ppulin jaleul gippeu ge hamyeo geulosseo bulsinjadeul-eul bungae hage haneun geosgwa gatdoda hananim-eun mid-eum-eulo uiloum-eul silcheonhaneun jadeul-ege gwan-yong-gwa keun bosang-eul yagsoghasyeoss nola
